column4: anyone have an idea as to why firefox would not launch after a fresh dapper install
do a "which firefox" then do a "file" against that file
run it against the links target
it spat the same file back out at me, I'll try executing it directly
how can a links target spit the same file out
follow the links through to the real file
/usr/lib/firefox/firefox must be the real file, when I did a which on it, it spat that same file back at me
ah, ok, file tells me its a shell script executable
view the script and see what its trying to launch
it looks like the script is running /usr/lib/firefox/firefox-bin
so execute that file from a terminal
that did it, gave me an error I can work with :-)
did you get firefox from the ubuntu repo ?
kep the install that came on the dapper desktop install, even tried reinstalling through synaptic, still no dice
